original_text: Now as Solomon finished offering all this prayer and plea to the Lord, he arose from before the altar of the Lord, where he had knelt with hands outstretched toward heaven.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 무릎을 꿇고 손을 펴서 하늘을 향하여 이 기도와 간구로 여호와께 아뢰기를 마치고 여호와의 제단 앞에서 일어나

sentences.original_text: Now as Solomon finished offering all this prayer and plea to the Lord,
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬이 주께 이 모든 기도와 간구를 드리기를 마치매,

sentences.original_text: he arose from before the altar of the Lord,
where he had knelt with hands outstretched toward heaven.
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 그가 하늘을 향해 손을 뻗고 무릎 꿇었던 곳이었다.
